entries.meaning: The act of sealing or ratifying.
examples: You seem in your letter to make the principal end and effect of all sacraments to be obsignation, and all sacraments to be merely obsignatory signs  [â€¦]

entries.meaning: Confirmation, as by the Holy Spirit.
examples: The spirit of manifestation will but upbraid you in the shame and horror of a sad eternity, if you have not the spirit of obsignation.
